vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Dan.1.3
§ Ashpenaz = "I will make prominent the sprinkled"
chief eunuch of Nebuchadnezzar
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jefe de los eunucos del rey Nabucodonosor
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞施毗拿
1) 尼在甲尼撒王的太監長 (但 1:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚施毗拿
1) 尼在甲尼撒王的太监长 (但 1:3)
